messages.title: It's time for real change in Bath
messages.content: Bath deserves better than a Tory MP who just does what Boris Johnson tells them. This is our chance for real change.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Mike has put forward a radical plan for tackling the climate emergency.
Mike will fight for a public vote on any Brexit deal, with remain on the ballot paper.
He will battle for more funding for our schools, so our children can get the education they deserve.
He's committed to giving the NHS the funding it needs.
Mike has a plan to tackle the housing crisis by building more affordable homes.
